name: Project: Heatstrike
description:
[Story]

You are a newly developed Robot on the science outpost Sadira.

You're being developed for the purpose of exploration and reconnaissance, and now at the end of development you're being tested to see how well you can platform and manouver.

Your tester and creator is Doctor H., he will guide you through these test.

[Features]

14 Levels

Dialog with 2 Characters

A jetpack for Awesome Mobility - Dash - Rocket Jump - Hover

A Cute Robot

[Controls]

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

Space(Midair) - Rocket Boost

Ctrl or RMB - Jet Hover

Shift(Midair) - Dash

ESC or P - Menu

[Credits]

This game was a semester project at the HTK Academy.

Sounds an music - Epidemic Sounds

Engine Used - Unreal 5.0.3

3D Tools - Blender
